Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2014 10:23AM Mdee wrote: One thing that confused me was the shape of this tissue or area on the ultrsound. It's not round but almost like if you were drawing both sides of a street.Â  It was weird. I was always told I had this large tissue.
Posts.Title: I had my biopsy this morning Mdee Mdee

Posts.Content: Mdee wrote: It went well. Didn't hurt at all. The techs were so nice. For the last 5 years, I've had a large tissue on the far right side of my right breast where 2 large cysts have grown from on separate occasions and both were aspirated. All testing shown to be normal. Apparently, there is a small change in it from my last testing so they ordered a mammogram.(plus an extra 25 lbs on my part) The lady doing the biopsy said it's possible with my history it could be scar tissue but there's no way to know until the biopsy comes back. Had a good talk with the tech and she explained all the changes that take place in a woman's breast. Since I have fibrocystic breasts, I'm hoping it's just that. I even had a couple of small cysts nearby the area. The tech told me the tissue is listed as 5cm but she didn't know how much of that was shadowing. I will probably know my results on Monday. I'm scared to death. Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2014 03:32PM Mdee wrote: Well, its a little odd but my first cyst grew overnight. I thought it was my wire poking me. It literally came out of nowhere. So of course its possible the sucker could of come back. Call the doctor and tell them it feels like it filled up again.
Posts.Title: Lump still the same after cyst aspiration? scared-mammy AZ85048

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2014 02:42PM Mdee wrote: It's always possible it grew back or one of the other ones grew bigger. I've had 2 large cysts grow in the same exact spot over a 5 yr period. Aspirating them doesn't make them go away for good.
Posts.Title: Lump still the same after cyst aspiration? scared-mammy AZ85048

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2014 03:59PM Mdee wrote: Cysts are a pain. My two were so large, they stuck out the side of my breast. Both were in the same exact spot, maybe even the same one. Now I've just had a biopsy on that same spot due to some change from my last test. The breast surgeon who drained the first one told me cysts can always grow back unless you take out the tissue they grow from. It's most likely a new one that filled up.
